name: When All You Have is a Racket
name_original: When All You Have is a Racket
description:
You're trapped in a gym, hordes of zombies are coming in from the only entrance, and all you have on hand is a badminton racket (plus an automatic shuttlecock launcher conveniently aimed at you). What do you do? Smash the shuttlecocks towards the zombies, of course!

Move your mouse to move the player. Left-click to swing the racket, and right-click to jump. Jump-smashing the shuttlecock will make it spread upon hitting a zombie.

This is a reupload for a game I made in Ludum Dare #32 (April 17th-20th 2015). Note that this is the Unity version.

Tools used:

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Image Editor: Paint.NET
  • BGM Editor: FamiTracker
  • SFX Editor: sfxr
